settings.heading: Some tips & tricks to speed your success!
We know you know your followers better than anyone, but we’ve seen a few sure-fire ways to help you rack up those redemptions even faster. Here’s the 4-1-1…

settings.text:
• Post a well-lit, front-facing “Before/After” collage to pique interest
  • Building on that last tip, also consider a collage that goes a step further by showing Before (top photo), After (middle photo), and After with Mascara (bottom photo).
  • Share a short testimonial about your authentic Lash Therapy transformation.
  • Make Hello and Lash Therapy a regular conversation topic. The more stories you share, the more interest you’ll build.

settings.title: Before and After
settings.text: Remember to take lash photos to track your lash growth progress! Put them next to each other to really showcase the difference Lash Therapy has made for you.

settings.title: A Glamour Shot
settings.text: Can really showcase your lashes when paired with a testimony and your discount code.

settings.title: Or maybe a comparison post would represent your experience well.
settings.text:
Show how Lash Therapy measures up to another product you’ve used to enhance your lashes,

like another serum, falsies/strips or extensions and why you think Lash Therapy is a better solution.

settings.heading-1: Is Hello Skincare a “clean beauty” brand?
settings.desc-1: The term “clean beauty” gets thrown around a lot these days, but its meaning isn’t always clear or consistent from brand to brand. So rather than just jumping on the bandwagon, we think it’s more important to let you know exactly what we mean by “clean” here at Hello.  Hello is absolutely meticulous about every aspect of our product formulations, and we make a conscious decision to eliminate ingredients that are proven harmful. All of our products are Vegan-friendly and cruelty-free as well as 100% free of all parabens, sulfates, phosphates, silicons, and synthetic dyes and fragrances. Hello is clean you can count on.

settings.heading-1: Do you offer a money back guarantee?
settings.desc-1: Yes! We don’t just believe in our products, we stand behind them with a 60-day money-back guarantee on any first-time purchase. If for any reason you’re not satisfied with your Hello product purchase, simply return the unused portion to us, and we’ll refund your total purchase price minus initial shipping and handling charges.
Always!  Hello never tests on animals, and we only source our ingredients from a select group of premium suppliers that uphold the same standard.
Absolutely! Hello Skincare’s entire product line is Vegan-friendly.

The answer is mostly yes! Hello offers free shipping on all U.S. and Canadian orders. However, we’re not able to provide free shipping to other countries at this time. For these international orders, shipping is calculated during checkout.

We do our best to get our products into your hands as quickly as possible. Every order is shipped within 1-2 business days. Once your order is processed, you’ll get an email confirmation with tracking details that keep you posted on your order’s estimated arrival.

settings.heading-1: How is Hello different from other beauty products?
settings.desc-1: At Hello, we believe that when science and nature work together, great things happen. We put that into practice to create amazing products that feel good and are better for you, so you look and feel your best. It’s why we choose only high-quality, biocompatible ingredients that have proven efficacy. We harness their regenerative and therapeutic properties to create perfectly balanced formulations that nourish the natural beauty and health of your skin. Hello is simply beauty, done better.

settings.heading-1: Customers say that my discount code isn’t working.
settings.desc-1: Most of the time, issues with discount codes mean the customer is trying to use your discount code on a subscription order. Make sure the customer is making a “one time purchase” versus a “subscribe and save” order. Subscription orders include a 15% discount, and Brand Partner discount codes can’t be combined with other discounts.

settings.heading-1: Can I get a custom code to participate in a Hello Skincare sale?
settings.desc-1: Custom codes to participate in Hello Skincare sales are a perk reserved for our Premier Partners. Once your code has 20 redemptions, you are eligible to participate in our sales. And that’s not all! Premier Partners actually get exclusive access to share our sales before we announce those sales to the general public.

settings.heading-1: Once I reach Premier Partner status, do I keep that status for forever and always?
settings.desc-1: When you reach Premier Partner status, it is guaranteed for the rest of that calendar year, as well as the next calendar year. In order to maintain your Premier Partner status, you do need to acquire 20 coupon code redemptions each subsequent year. For example, if you made Premier Partner in 2023, you have it for the rest of 2023 and 2024…but you need to acquire 20 code redemptions in 2024 in order to maintain your status for 2025. This helps to ensure that the Premier Partner status remains exclusive.

settings.heading-1: I was a New Brand Partner with some code redemptions. Did I lose those?
settings.desc-1: Nope! All your code redemptions stay on your profile. If you are a New Brand Partner and have not yet been upgraded to our Influencer Tier, please contact us ASAP and we will get you enrolled so you can start earning commission for your code redemptions. The New Brand Partner tier will be deleted on December 31, 2024.

settings.heading-1: I am interested in trying Lash Therapy in exchange for UGC.
settings.desc-1: We partner with some influencers to receive complimentary product, on a case by case basis. We are looking for partners excited about earning commission through our affiliate program and are not currently in need of additional UGC.
